english.segment1: You know what day it is?. The day we fell in love. Long and sad goodbyes. So sad you couldn't stay
english.segment2: You don't have to go. Spend the holidays
english.segment3: You know what time it is?. It's time to fall in love. Sad to see you go. So sad you couldn't stay
english.segment4: You don't have to go. Spend the holidays
